title: Restorative
description: Restore damaged or decayed teeth with our advanced restorative techniques.
content: Our restorative techniques include fillings, crowns, and bridges to restore the function and appearance of your teeth. We use state-of-the-art materials that blend seamlessly with your natural teeth.

packages.basic restorative package: $250 - includes 2 amalgam restorations and 1 composite restoration

title: Orthodontic
description: Achieve a perfect smile with our orthodontic services including braces and aligners.
content: Our orthodontic services help align your teeth and jaws for better aesthetics and function. We offer traditional braces as well as modern clear aligners to suit your lifestyle.

packages.orthodontic consultation package: $100 - includes initial consultation and treatment plan

title: Prosthodontic Fixed
description: Get permanent solutions for missing teeth with our fixed prosthodontics.
content: Fixed prosthodontics involve crowns, bridges, and dentures that are permanently attached. They restore the function of your teeth and improve your smile's aesthetics.

title: Partial Prosthodontic
description: Enhance your smile with our partial prosthodontic services.
content: Partial prosthodontics provide a solution for those with missing teeth. Our custom partial dentures are designed to blend with your existing teeth for a natural look.

packages.partial prosthodontic package: $1,500 - includes a partial denture and a follow-up consultation

title: Implant
description: Replace missing teeth with dental implants that look and function like natural teeth.
content: Dental implants are a long-term solution for missing teeth, involving a titanium post that serves as the root, topped with a natural-looking crown. They help maintain jawbone health and restore function.

packages.implant package: $4,000 - includes 1 implant and crown with follow-up visits

title: Pedodontic
description: Specialized dental care for children to ensure healthy growth of their teeth.
content: Our pedodontic services are tailored for children, focusing on preventive care and education to promote healthy dental habits from an early age.

title: Minor and Major Surgery
description: Expert surgical care for various dental needs.
content: Our team provides comprehensive surgical services for tooth extractions, biopsies, and more complex procedures. We ensure patient comfort and safety throughout the process.

packages.surgical package: $400 - includes consultation and simple tooth extraction

title: GA Services
description: General anesthesia services for a comfortable dental experience.
content: We offer general anesthesia for patients who require extensive dental work or have anxiety about procedures. Our trained staff ensures a safe and comfortable experience.

packages.GA comfort package: $700 - includes GA and consultation for extensive procedures

title: Cosmetic
description: Enhance your smile with our cosmetic dentistry options.
content: Our cosmetic dentistry services include teeth whitening, veneers, and bonding to improve the appearance of your smile. We tailor our treatments to fit your unique needs.

packages.cosmetic package: $400 - includes scaling, polishing, and teeth whitening (normally $200)

title: Botox/Filler Skin Care
description: Revitalize your appearance with our botox and filler services.
content: Our dental practice offers botox and dermal fillers to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and enhance your smile. Our experienced professionals ensure safe and effective treatments.

packages.aesthetic package: $700 - includes both botox and filler treatment

title: PerioDontitis
description: Revitalize your appearance with our botox and filler services.
content: Our periodontal services focus on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of gum disease, ensuring the health of your gums and overall oral hygiene.

title: X-ray
description: Revitalize your appearance with our botox and filler services.
content: X-ray services help us diagnose and plan treatments for dental issues effectively. We use advanced imaging technology for accurate assessments.
